title: Patch 7.1
body:
I just launched my client and it's currently stuck on the update even before where it appears the %.

It loaded all the way 118.5 mb/ 118.5 mb and it says ETA 0 minutes, but it's been stuck like that for about 30 minutes. Is this normal?

If not, how would I go about fixing this?

I tried restarting the client and it's doing the same thing.

replies.body: If you're getting stuck at 0% then it's unlikely that it ever reached the patching servers.  The system first needs to scan your game files to prepare for an update, so I'd first suggest waiting a bit to let it do it's thing.  I don't recommend taking any steps unless you are getting any error messages.  If it does take too long though, I'd recommend using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your PC is allowing access to game files.  I hope that helps!

It is resolved.

I just took off my phone that was charging through my laptop.

Also restarted the computer.
